card.name: Act of Aggression
card.text: Gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Alloy Myr
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Apostle's Blessing
card.text: Target artifact or creature you control gains protection from artifacts or from the color of your choice until end of turn.

card.name: Argent Mutation
card.text: Target permanent becomes an artifact in addition to its other types until end of turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Arm with AEther
card.text: Until end of turn, creatures you control gain "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand."

card.name: Artillerize
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Artillerize, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Artillerize deals 5 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Auriok Survivors
card.text: When Auriok Survivors enters the battlefield, you may return target Equipment card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you do, you may attach it to Auriok Survivors.

card.name: Batterskull
card.text: Living weapon Equipped creature gets +4/+4 and has vigilance and lifelink. {3}: Return Batterskull to its owner's hand. Equip {5}

card.name: Beast Within
card.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller puts a 3/3 green Beast creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Birthing Pod
card.text: {1}{GP}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed creature's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Blade Splicer
card.text: When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, put a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token onto the battlefield. Golem creatures you control have first strike.

card.name: Blighted Agent
card.text: Infect Blighted Agent can't be blocked.

card.name: Blind Zealot

card.name: Blinding Souleater
card.text: {WP}, {T}: Tap target creature.

card.name: Bludgeon Brawl
card.text: Each noncreature, non-Equipment artifact is an Equipment with equip {X} and "Equipped creature gets +X/+0," where X is that artifact's converted mana cost.

card.name: Brutalizer Exarch
card.text: When Brutalizer Exarch enters the battlefield, choose one - Search your library for a creature card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it; or put target noncreature permanent on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Caged Sun
card.text: As Caged Sun enters the battlefield, choose a color. Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+1. Whenever a land's ability adds one or more mana of the chosen color to your mana pool, add one additional mana of that color to your mana pool.

card.name: Caress of Phyrexia
card.text: Target player draws three cards, loses 3 life, and gets three poison counters.

card.name: Cathedral Membrane
card.text: Defender When Cathedral Membrane dies during combat, it deals 6 damage to each creature it blocked this combat.

card.name: Chained Throatseeker
card.text: Infect Chained Throatseeker can't attack unless defending player is poisoned.

card.name: Chancellor of the Annex
card.text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, when each opponent casts his or her first spell of the game, counter that spell unless that player pays {1}. Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, counter it unless that player pays {1}.

card.name: Chancellor of the Dross
card.text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life, then you gain life equal to the life lost this way. Flying, lifelink

card.name: Chancellor of the Forge
card.text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, put a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste onto the battlefield. When Chancellor of the Forge enters the battlefield, put X 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens with haste onto the battlefield, where X is the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Chancellor of the Spires
card.text: You may reveal this card from your opening hand. If you do, at the beginning of the first upkeep, each opponent puts the top seven cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Flying When Chancellor of the Spires enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Chancellor of the Tangle

card.name: Corrosive Gale
card.text: Corrosive Gale deals X damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Death-Hood Cobra
